description: Construction of single storey rear extension with basement (following demolition of existing rear addition), re-roofing of existing two storey outrigger including an alteration to its pitch on the eastern side, creation of mansard roof to rear and alteration to openings
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 0845-PL(00) 01 Rev K, 0845-PL(00) 02 Rev H, 0845-PL(00) 03 Rev H, 0845-PL(00) 21 Rev H, 0845-PL(00) 22 Rev H, 0845-PL(00) 23 Rev H.   Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding any information submitted with the application, details of the materials and finishes to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development is commenced.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with these approved details.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies; 3.7, 5.18, 7.1, 7.2, 7.4, 7.5, 7.6 and 7.7, of the London Plan (2011), Policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies Ealing Local Variation to London Plan Policy 7.4, 7C and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2011). | A detailed method statement relating to the construction of the basement shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the development is commenced. The statement shall include details of phasing and programming, removal of earth from site; construction methods; site management and access; vehicle and machinery specifications and numbers/frequency of vehicles/deliveries. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved method statement or as otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  Reason:  In the interests of the amenity of adjoining occupiers and to minimise highway and traffic impact during the course of the works, in accordance with policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (j) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and policies 5.14 and 5.15 of the London Plan 2011. | No part of the roof of the ground floor extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2011). | The proposed roof lights on the rear roof slope of the roof extension hereby approved shall only be constructed in a conservation style.   Reason: To ensure that the roof lights harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 , 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2011).
